sentences.sContent: They resettled in Los Angeles in 1998.
sentences.sCn: 他们在1998年重新定居于洛杉矶。

sentences.sContent: They are going from Shanghai to Los Angeles via Tokyo.
sentences.sCn: 他们从上海经东京去洛杉矶。

sentences.sContent: From there we would drive down the coast to Los Angeles.
sentences.sCn: 从旧金山我们将沿着西海岸开车到洛杉矶。
